description: Demolition of an existing care home and bungalows; erection of 4 storey apartment block to the front and a 2 storey mews terrace to the rear to provide accommodation for the elderly; renovation and extension of the existing St Margarets House and single storey office/meeting building; provision of associated landscaping and car parking
